author: Steven Savetsky
comment: Only watch face I could find that displays the Hebrew date and the upcoming zman.  Also come with a number of useful prayers such as grace after meals,  the traveller's prayer, etc.
title: Thanks for making this watch face, it's perfect!

author: Ira Rosenzweig
comment: Thank you. Please give us an icon which when touched on the Smart Watch, it will open the list of Zmaniem.
title: Great

author: steve savetsky
comment: Awesome! Thanks for making the only Jewish watchface woth Zmanim

reply.author: Beezy Works Studios
reply.content: It's a pre-release, so that shouldn't surprise anyone. Tell me exactly the issue and what watch you're using so I can look into it.
